meanings.definition: To cause someone to remember something.
meanings.sent1: Seeing the old photograph rereminds me of our family vacation.
meanings.sent2: The smell of fresh cookies rereminds me of baking with my grandma.
meanings.sent3: The sound of the ice cream truck rereminds me to check my wallet for change.
meanings.sent4: The melody of the song rereminds me of a peaceful evening by the lake.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the full moon rereminds me to make a wish.

meanings.definition: To prompt someone to recall a past event.
meanings.sent1: Her story rereminds me of the time we got lost in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The smell of rain rereminds me of our camping trip last summer.
meanings.sent3: The taste of lemonade rereminds me of the picnic where we played games all day.
meanings.sent4: The sight of the old swing rereminds me of the fun we had at the park.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter rereminds me of the party where we danced all night.

meanings.definition: To bring a memory back to someone's mind.
meanings.sent1: The familiar tune rereminds me of my childhood days.
meanings.sent2: The sight of the ocean rereminds me of our beach vacation.
meanings.sent3: The smell of fresh bread rereminds me of the bakery near my house.
meanings.sent4: The taste of hot cocoa rereminds me of winter evenings by the fireplace.
meanings.sent5: The sound of birds chirping rereminds me of early mornings in the countryside.
